{"rule":"ENGLISH_WORD_REPEAT_RULE","sentence":"^\\QInternal data Data that lives inside a company's own systems Wages of employees across different business units tracked by HR, Sales data by store location, Product inventory levels across distribution centers\nExternal data Data that lives outside a company or organization National average wages for the various positions throughout your organization, Credit reports for customers of an auto dealership\\E$"}
{"rule":"ENGLISH_WORD_REPEAT_RULE","sentence":"^\\QContinuous data Data that is measured and can have almost any numeric value Height of kids in third grade classes (52.5 inches, 65.7 inches), Runtime markers in a video, Temperature\nDiscrete data Data that is counted and has a limited number of values Number of people who visit a hospital on a daily basis (10, 20, 200), Room's maximum capacity allowed, Tickets sold in the current month\\E$"}
{"rule":"ENGLISH_WORD_REPEAT_RULE","sentence":"^\\QStructured data Data organized in a certain format, like rows and columns Expense reports, Tax returns, Store inventory\nUnstructured data Data that isn't organized in any easily identifiable manner Social media posts, Emails, Videos\\E$"}
